about_the_game:
Includes the following items:

● Shizuna's 'Z1 Pit Girl' Attire
　A race queen outfit designed specifically for Team Spriggan in accordance with the tastes of their sponsor, Prince Sherid, when Arkride Solutions decided to enter the Z1 Grand Prix as a satellite team.
● Winning Poster Contest Art
　Causes the winning entries of the movie poster contest to be more prominently displayed within certain areas of the game.

- Items can be redeemed by selecting the added bundle(s) from the DLC tab under 'Items' in the Main menu in game.
- After redeeming 'Winning Poster Contest Art,' the movie posters throughout the cities in game will automatically be updated.

content_descriptors.notes:
Rare occurrences of violence against bound hostages.
Discrimination against fictional minorities.
Usage of Fantasy Drugs.
Insinuation of child prostitution.
Depiction of Suicide

detailed_description:
Includes the following items:

● Shizuna's 'Z1 Pit Girl' Attire
　A race queen outfit designed specifically for Team Spriggan in accordance with the tastes of their sponsor, Prince Sherid, when Arkride Solutions decided to enter the Z1 Grand Prix as a satellite team.
● Winning Poster Contest Art
　Causes the winning entries of the movie poster contest to be more prominently displayed within certain areas of the game.

- Items can be redeemed by selecting the added bundle(s) from the DLC tab under 'Items' in the Main menu in game.
- After redeeming 'Winning Poster Contest Art,' the movie posters throughout the cities in game will automatically be updated.
